faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I choose the right plan?
faq.a1: Choose based on your team size, project complexity, and required features. Free is good for individuals, Professional for small teams, and Enterprise for comprehensive features and support.

personal.name: Personal
personal.description: Perfect for individual developers and hobbyists

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you or your team

faqA.description: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and plans.
faqA.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, you'll receive credit towards future billing.
faqA.answer2: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all paid plans. No credit card required.
faqA.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faqA.answer3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual Enterprise plans.
faqA.answer4: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team.

hero.title: Empowering Developers Worldwide

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Space-Brain was founded in 2020 with a mission to create intelligent development tools that enhance productivity.
story.paragraph2: Our team of experienced developers and designers is dedicated to building tools that make coding more efficient and enjoyable.
story.paragraph3: We believe in the power of technology to transform the way developers work and create.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower developers with intelligent tools that enhance productivity and creativity

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading platform for intelligent development tools worldwide

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the people behind Space Brain

member1.name: John Smith
member1.bio: With over 20 years of experience in software development, John founded Space Brain with a vision to create tools that developers truly love.

member2.name: Sarah Johnson
member2.bio: Sarah leads our technical team with her expertise in AI and machine learning, bringing innovative features to our products.

member3.name: Michael Chen
member3.bio: Michael ensures our products meet the highest standards of quality and user experience through his meticulous attention to detail.

member4.name: Emily Rodriguez
member4.bio: Emily is dedicated to ensuring our customers get the most out of our products through excellent support and training.
